properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
SAINT LUCIA TO SAINT VINCENT.
18 FOOT F/V ZION, BLUE HULL, TWO PERSONS
ON BOARD, OVERDUE VIEUX FORT (13-45N 060-57W)
TO SAINT VINCENT (13-15N 061-12W). VESSEL
REPORTED ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE AT
251800Z DEC. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 59 659 670 9292,
FAX: 59 659 663 2450.
